block_comment: The Verilog RTL block enables hardware implementation of CRC initialization. It performs the operation by leveraging a bitwise OR operation on "StateIdle", "StatePreamble", and a bitwise OR reduction of "DlyCrcCnt", generating an output "Initialize_Crc". The result output indictes the necessity to initialize Cyclic Redundancy Check, signifying either idle state, preambulatory state, or when any bit in DlyCrcCnt is active.
